CHANGES:
## 2026.01.30.05 - UX: Improved Dashboard card with detailed stat grid (Swappiness, Load, Savings). - UX: Enhanced Swappiness visibility and clarified global system settings. - UX: Improved Swap management with OOM-aware safety guards and dynamic warnings. - UX: Better column labeling and priority tooltips for easier management. - Fix: Robust parsing of system swap priorities for reliable display.
## 2026.01.25.66 - Official Initial Release.
